Text:
There are more stuff-packs and expansion packs released after this version. I'd recommend downloading those.

If you need a crack, just go to a game fixes website like gamecopyworld to get cracks and fixed images.
The Crack Just Look It Up In Google And Download Then Drag To Files To :Local Disc/Program files/Eletronic arts/The sims 3 (Whatever expansion)/Game/Bin Then Drag it there
